content: Use this simple Skincare Routine for Dry Skin and watch your skin’s look and texture transform🌿💕✨💦 ⭐️Step 1: Cleanse with a gentle antioxidant rich cleanser that doesn't strip your skin of oils. Drying face washes can do this and leave skin damaged. ⭐️Step 2: Tone with a deep hydrating toner that locks in moisture such as Hyaluronic Acid. Try our Aloe Cucumber Mist with Niacinamide that locks in moisture and exfoliates the top layer of dry and damaged skin. ⭐️Step 3: Hydrate with a rich moisturizer like our multifunctional Daily Moisture Sun Protection Lotion. It works great with all skin types and also protects from the sun and pollution with ingredients like Aloe Vera Juice, Ashwagandha, Lodhra, & Nagkesar. ⭐️Step 4: If you have very dry skin you can incorporate this additional step. Lock in all that moisture with a rich oil that helps repair and rejuvenate damaged dry skin like our R&R Night Serum with Rosehip, Seabuckthorn, Hemp and Pomegranate oil Follow for 30 days to see your skin glow and get those compliments rolling in. #GetGlowing 🌈🌿🌸

content: Beach babe @aliajashanmal 💕 makes sure her skin stays cool, protected and hydrated whether diving 🐳 laying by the beach 🏝 or hanging by the pool 👙 Check our all NEW Summer ☀️ Skincare Collection for multitasking skincare products that work whilst you play. Natural 🌿Vegan 🐰 & Sustainable 🌎 Skincare for beautiful luminous skin ✨Shop at www.kalhans.com

Our Daily Moisture Sun ☀️ Protection Lotion is a multi- tasking wonder. This 3-in-one cream protects ☂ brightens ✨ and moisturizes 🌊skin for a luminous radiance. The light weight formulation effortlessly absorbs into your skin without leaving a trace while giving you a daily dose of revitalizing moisture and helping protect you from the sun and pollution. The rich natural ingredients in this multi-functional cream also helps reduce signs of aging, protects from tanning and enhances your skin's optimal health, leaving it soft and dewy, Because, Who said you can't have it all? Key Ingredients: 🌿Ashwagandha- Ashwagandha, is a potent antioxidant that helps protect skin from skin damaging free radicals 🌿Nagkesar-Nagkesar is a natural skin brightener that also helps exfoliate skin for a fresh dewy glow. It also helps minimize open pores and clarify skin for an even toned and glowing complexion. 🌿Lodhra- Lodhra works as a broad range UV protector with the ability to block UVA and UVB wavelengths, limiting the overall impact of UV on the skin. Shop Now: www.kalhans.com💕
